title: Designation of anatomical gift
context: ยง286-109.5 Designation of anatomical gift. The examiner of drivers shall design and implement a system to request anatomical gift information from all applicants for a driver&rsquo;s license or license renewal, at the time of application, including a method of directly imprinting on a license an applicant&rsquo;s designation of whether the applicant wishes to be an organ donor. The request shall elicit whether the applicant wishes to be an organ donor in the event of the applicant&rsquo;s death. [L 1975, c 80, ยง1; am L Sp 1977 1st, c 20, ยง12; gen ch 1985; am L 1990, c 18, ยง2] Note Developing an organ donor registry. L 2008, c 165. Cross References Uniform Anatomical Gift Act, see chapter 327.
